question: Which country has recently carried out the lander test for its first unmanned Mars mission in 2020?
explanation: China on November 14,2019 successfully completed a lander test in northern Hebei province ahead of an unmanned exploration mission to Mars next year. The journey through space will take about seven months, while landing will take seven minute. The test was conducted at a sprawling landing test site in Huailai, northwest of Beijing. China has developed the powerful long March 5 rocket to transport the probe to Mars in 2020.
